name: Chicken Cobb Salad 🥩
description: Upgrade this classic salad with grilled chicken and crumbled blue cheese. Topped with crispy bacon and a hard-boiled egg, it's a satisfying and delicious meal that'll keep you going all day.
instructions: Make the dressing: Combine blue cheese dressing, salt, and pepper in a 16-ounce (480 ml) mason jar.  Stir with a fork until well-combined.
Add the tomato, chicken, bacon bits, hard boiled egg, and lettuce.
Store in the refrigerator for 2-3 days.
When ready to eat, shake well to combine.
